bibdata.title: IEEE Draft Recommended Practice for the Analysis of In-Band and Adjacent Band Interference and Coexistence Between Radio Systems
IEEE Draft Recommended Practice for the Analysis of In-Band and Adjacent Band Interference and Coexistence Between Radio Systems
bibdata.docidentifier: IEEE Unapproved Draft Std P1900.2/D4.02, Nov 2007

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: This recommended practice provides 1 technical guidelines for analyzing the coexistence or, alternatively, the interference between radio systems, operating in the same spectrum assignment or between different spectrum assignments.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
